creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Dr. Glen D. Nelson
description: View from beneath a subway platform of a wide open street; a pedestrian on L walks away from the viewer; across the street and to the R is a large white billboard and some non-descript buildings; subtle to increasing detail towards foreground; colors: black, pale green, cream
medium: Color lithograph, with oil, pastel and graphite additions
title: Under the El
